alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 1:54PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Logan, Scott and west central Yell Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 154 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Beauchamp, or 13 miles north of Mena, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Booneville... Waldron... Beauchamp... Cardiff... Oliver... Gravelly... Union Hill... Winfield... Olio... Hon... Nola... Needmore... Harvey... Sugar Grove... Boles... Carolan... Parks... Grayson... Blue Ball... Ione... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
